original_text: People will take you into their meeting places. They will make you stand in front of rulers and other people that have authority. They will want to show that you have done bad things. But do not be afraid of them. Do not worry about what you should say.
korean_text: 사람이 너희를 회당이나 위정자나 권세 있는 자 앞에 끌고 가거든 어떻게 무엇으로 대답하며 무엇으로 말할까 염려하지 말라

sentences.original_text: People will take you into their meeting places
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 너를 그들의 회당으로 데려갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will make you stand in front of rulers
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너를 통치자들 앞에 세울 것이다

sentences.original_text: and other people that have authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 권위를 가진 다른 사람들 앞에 세울 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will want to show that you have done bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너가 나쁜 일들을 했다는 것을 보이려고 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: But do not be afraid of them
Do not worry about what you should say
